tips: ✍️ Practice writing regularly to improve your skills, even if it's just a short paragraph each day.
📚 Read a variety of texts to expose yourself to different writing styles and expand your vocabulary.
🗣️ Discuss your ideas with classmates or teachers to gain new perspectives and refine your arguments.
🔍 Seek feedback on your writing and be open to constructive criticism to keep improving.
🎯 Set specific writing goals, such as mastering different types of essays, to stay motivated and track your progress.
